Package lu.uni.distributedsystems.project.commander

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Commander
    Commander allows scripting of multiple bookies and gamblers.
    CommandsSection
    Commands sections handle individual gambler/bookie commands.
    ConfigurationSection
    Configuration sections contain the list of partners.
    Connection
    Connection represents a JSON-RPC connection with some partner, such as e.g.
    ConnectionHandler
    A ConnectionHandler sends commands to a bookie or gambler for remote execution.
    IncludeSection
    Include sections allow to process commands from a script file.
    Section
    Base class for all sections.
